class slam.data_manager.data_manager.DataManager(cfg: DataManagerConfig)[source]

Bases: object

Manages all data processes.

@overload. Creates a data batch sequentially based on regime in config.

@overload. Creates a data batch with given measurements

Parameters:

measurements (deque[Element]) – list of elements without row data

@overload. Creates a data batch from requests.

Parameters:

  • requests (set[PeriodicDataRequest]) – set of requests.

  • limits (Each request corresponds to sensor and time) – (start, stop)
